data.name: One Dark Night
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Famed Russian occultist, Karl Raymar is found dead in his home, with the bodies of six dead women, and no real explanation. This mystery stresses Raymer's daughter Olivia (Melissa Newman) and causes her to have strange visions. Her husband Allan (Adam West) struggles to help his wife find answers, as to what her father was up to. Meanwhile high school student Julie Wells (Meg Tilly) is at the final step of being initiated into an exclusive club known as "The Sisters". To be initiated she must spend a night in the town's mausoleum, which the recently dead Raymar has been interred. As the night progresses Olivia and Alan begin to uncover evidence that her father had power over life and death. Unfortunately for Julie, he may be returning to the world of the living tonight!

data.short_description: Famed Russian occultist, Karl Raymar is mysteriously found dead in his home with the bodies of six dead women. Meanwhile high school student Julie Wells is at the final step of being initiated into an exclusive club, but to complete the initiation, she must spend a night in the town's mausoleum where the recently dead Raymar has been...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
